import "./App.css" import React from "react" import productsData from "./productsData.json" // Import the products data function App() { const shoesProducts = productsData.filter( (product) => product.category === "Shoes" ) const watchesProducts = productsData.filter( (product) => product.category === "Watches" ) let displayShoes = true, displayWatches = false const handleShoes = () => { displayWatches = false displayShoes = true } const handleWatches = () => { displayShoes = false displayWatches = true } return (

ShopCart

Cart

{displayShoes && ( shoesProducts.map(product => (

{product.name}

{product.price}

{product.description}

)) )}
{displayWatches && ( watchesProducts.map(product => (

{product.name}

{product.price}

{product.description}

)) )}
) } export default App
